participant_1.name: Jake Thompson
participant_1.personality: Jake is a laid-back individual who enjoys deep conversations and has a good sense of humor. He has a passion for storytelling and often finds joy in sharing his experiences.
participant_1.background: Last month the farm was foreclosed so I am looking for a new job. I live in Kansas. I am an out of work farmhand. I like watching reality television shows. I would like to move some place warmer.

participant_2.name: Emily Carter
participant_2.personality: Emily is an avid reader with a love for the macabre. She's thoughtful and enjoys discussing literature and film. Her nurturing nature shines through in her profession.
participant_2.background: My favorite author is Stephen King. My favorite movie genre is horror. I love to read. I am a vet tech.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1.
Hi, I'm participant_2.
What do you do for fun?
I like to read, especially horror novels.
Oh, I like horror movies. What's your favorite Stephen King book?
It's a tie between The Shining and The Stand.
Those are both great! I've read both of them.
Have you seen the movie adaptations?
Yeah, I have. The Shining is one of my favorite movies.
Me too! It's so creepy.
What do you like about it?
I like the atmosphere and the characters. Jack Nicholson is so good as Jack Torrance.
I agree! He's so terrifying in that role.
I know, right? It's one of my favorite performances by an actor.
What's your favorite horror movie?
I'm not sure I can pick just one. I love a lot of them.
Me too. I think my favorite horror movie is The Exorcist.
That's a classic! I love that movie too.
I'm glad to meet someone who loves horror movies as much as I do.
Me too! We should watch some movies together sometime.
That would be fun
